comment: * State for keeping track of long counting information.

methods.name: public abstract long getCountLocked(int which)
methods.comment:
* Returns the count associated with this Counter for the
         * selected type of statistics.
         *
         * @param which one of STATS_SINCE_CHARGED, STATS_SINCE_UNPLUGGED, or STATS_CURRENT

methods.name: public abstract long getCountForProcessState(@BatteryConsumer.ProcessState int procState)
methods.comment:
* Returns the count accumulated by this Counter for the specified process state.
         * If the counter does not support per-procstate tracking, returns 0.

methods.name: public abstract void logState(Printer pw, String prefix)

methodNames: public abstract void logState(Printer pw, String prefix)
